description.value: You know the dancing lights cantrip. When you reach 3rd level you know the faerie fire spell and can cast it once with this trait, regaining the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level you know the darkness spell and can cast it once with this trait, regaining the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
